<style>
    #box2 {
        width: 50%;
        height: 50%;
    }

    #box3 {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
    }

    #box3 > div {
        width: 50%;
        height: 50%;
    }
</style>

<style>
    :root {/* default font size = 16px */}

    /* :root selects the root element */
    #box4 {
        width: 4rem;
        height: 4rem;
    }

    #box5 {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        font-size: 12px;
    }

    #box5 > div {
        width: 4em;
        height: 4em;
    }
</style>

<style>
    #box6 {
        width: 100px;
        height: 100px;
        border: 2px solid teal;
    }

    #box7 {
        margin: 10px; 
        width: 100px; 
        height: 100px; 
        border: 2px dashed teal;
    }

    #box8 {
        padding: 20px; 
        width: 100px; 
        height: 100px; 
        border: 5px double teal;
    }

    #box9 {
        margin: 20px; 
        padding: 20px; 
        width: 100px; 
        height: 100px; 
        border: 2px dotted red;
    }

</style>
